title.rendered: Applicature Silicon Valley Welcomes Mykyta Safronenko in Project Management Role

content.rendered:
Mykyta Safronenko joins Applicature Silicon Valley for blockchain development and ICO projects in the Bay Area.

USA, San Francisco, January 26, 2018 – We are excited to announce and welcome Mykyta Safronenko as Project Manager and Consultant at Applicature Silicon Valley. He will reinforce our presence and help our clients in our mutual blockchain development projects. He will also engage in local activities in cryptocurrency and the blockchain industry, facilitating Applicature’s contribution to the young, yet a fast-growing industry.

“Our fundamental aim in Silicon Valley is to help tech companies, banks, and logistics companies adopt blockchain, as well as tap into ICO and tokenization in the most productive way, ” Mykyta remarked upon his activity.

Mykyta graduated from San Francisco State University and, as regional director, started development of the SUSTA center (the Federation of Ukrainian Student Organizations of America) in California. Mykyta Safronenko has devoted the last five years to the growth of the Ukrainian community in Silicon Valley. His recent activities have been in relation to his employment at Facebook and Google, as well as VC relations for Ukrainian startups within the UAhub project.
